attributes.action: Put more Police on the local Beat
attributes.additional_details: Gangs on under age children hanging around the garages in the evening, smoking and dropping rubbish. Then causing damage to car wing mirrors, scratching them with keys! Also a major spike in the rise of local cars being stolen
attributes.background: Our area has recently been targeted by youths and people roaming the streets after 2am. Damaging vehicles and being caught on cctv. Local breakins are on the increase too, and local allotments vandalised! We need local Police walking the beat all times of day and night knowing the local communities
